mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, POSITION, HIRE_DATE, HIRE_TYPE, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, STATUS, RESIGN_DATE, SAVE_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, DEPT_ID) VALUES (#{userId},#{password},#{name},#{position},#{hireDate},#{hireType},#{birthDate},#{phone},#{email},#{status},#{resignDate},#{saveName},#{originName},#{deptId})
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.PASSWORD, U.NAME, U.POSITION, U.HIRE_DATE, U.HIRE_TYPE, U.BIRTH_DATE, U.PHONE, U.EMAIL, U.STATUS, U.RESIGN_DATE, U.SAVE_NAME, U.ORIGIN_NAME, U.DEPT_ID, D.DEPT_NAME FROM USERS U JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON U.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USER_ID= #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT PASSWORD FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID= #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID, NAME, POSITION FROM USERS WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND STATUS = 1
